item.title: EP 836 - The Cryptid Pimp Of Watts
item.itunes:title: The Cryptid Pimp Of Watts
item.description:
Today we learn to not eat leftovers, and then we investigate the Dog Woman of Watts and discover that cryptids might have pimps!

Special Thanks to Rudie Jazz for giving me the “Pretty Woman” idea! (and they are not to blame for the end result!)

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 28 - Hot Wings (Don't Eat Honey Smacks E.coli cereal episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-28-hot-wings

EP 825 - Kevin Wikse The Pagan Strongman Vs The Men In Black!

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-825-kevin-wikse-the-pagan-strongman-vs-the-men-in-black

EP 829 - Missing 411 SOLVED!?!? (Kevin Wiske episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-829-missing-411-solved

College student has legs and fingers amputated, suffers multiple-organ failure after eating leftover noodles

https://www.theblaze.com/news/college-student-legs-fingers-amputated-after-eating-leftovers

A 19-Year-Old Man with Shock, Multiple Organ Failure, and Rash

https://www.nejm.org/doi/story/10.1056/feature.2021.02.19.100086

A Student Ate Suspicious Leftovers For Lunch. This Is What Happened To His Limbs.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EqHpnoV00j4&t=127s&ab_channel=Chubbyemu

He ate a slug on a dare, became paralyzed and died (I didn’t cover this on the show)

https://www.cnn.com/2018/11/05/health/man-dies-after-eating-slug-on-dare/index.html

Diagnosis, Treatment, and Complications

https://www.cdc.gov/meningococcal/about/diagnosis-treatment.html

The Dog Woman of Watts

https://mightandmagick.com/the-dog-woman-of-watts/

The Dog Woman of Watts

http://www.weirdca.com/location.php?location=198

The Dog Woman of Watts

http://www.laalmanac.com/mysterious/my721.php

  1. The Wolf Ape of Watts Valley

https://www.fresyes.com/fresno/strange-creatures/

Watts Valley Wolf Ape

https://sasquatchchronicles.com/watts-valley-wolf-ape/

The Watts Valley Wolf Ape

https://www.weirdfresno.com/2008/09/watts-valley-wolf-ape.html
